about_the_game:
explore

● you can explore in the vanity, harvest all kinds of resources in the void.
● exploration will not be smooth, void of power in the peep you, war and peace, plundered and looted, all this depends on whether you strong.

Race and civilization

● will born all RACES and civilizations in the world.
● humans, elves, machinery, different insect four RACES.
● technology, biological, uniting, faith, the world tree, Al six civilization.
● the combination of race and civilization brings to the game more, and make the world more powerful.
● you also notice that some might undermine the world civilization in a particular situation.

biological

● let own breed more creatures in the world, different creatures have different features.
● goblins, dragon people, no face, etc in a wide range of biological although not birth civilization, but have more interesting events. These events will have an impact on your world.

The decision

● to some extent, you have a lot of decisions.
● creatures, race, civilization is born your attitude will determine their fate.

name: 循环世界

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 无要求
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT750
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: Looping World is an independent survival simulation game in which you have to play a conscious world, survive in a dangerous void, and at the same time survive to create more species.
